Wireless connectivity: Integrating wireless connectivity, such as Bluetooth or NFC, can provide a seamless and clutter-free listening experience.
Customizable sound profiles: Offering customizable sound profiles allows users to tailor the audio output to their personal preferences, whether they prefer bass-heavy or treble-heavy sound.
Longer battery life: Incorporating a larger battery can extend the headphones' battery life, allowing users to listen to their favorite tunes for longer periods without needing to recharge.

Voice assistant integration: Integrating a voice assistant, such as Siri or Google Assistant, can provide hands-free control and access to additional features, such as controlling smart home devices or making phone calls.
Portable charging case: A portable charging case can provide an additional battery life, allowing users to charge their headphones on-the-go.
